lead_paragraph: Danielle Whyte pleaded not guilty of manslaughter and criminally negligent homicide and her companion, Jose Feliciano, pleaded not guilty of murder and manslaughter.

headline.print_headline: Mother Is Charged in Death of Infant
headline.main: Bronx Mother Charged in Death of Infant Whose Body Was Left in Woods

snippet: Danielle Whyte pleaded not guilty of manslaughter and criminally negligent homicide and her companion, Jose Feliciano, pleaded not guilty of murder and manslaughter.
abstract: Prosecutors announce Danielle Whyte of Bronx has been indicted on charges of manslaughter and criminally negligent homicide in connection with death of her 7-week-old son; body was found after Whyte discusses her son's death with hospital worker.
